name: pwuniss

stmt.pretty: syl6sseq(⋃ c0, c1, ⋃ P(c1), c0 ⊆ P(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), cuni(cpw(c1))))
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(c1)), c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), cuni(cpw(c1))))
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(c1)), c1)

|- wi(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1))
-| wceq(cuni(cpw(c1)), c1)

comment: Condition for a class union to be a subset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2020.)
